com.readytalk.swt.util

Class Palette

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.readytalk.swt.util.Palette

  • public class Palette
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to capture a set of background colors, fonts, what have you and apply it to multiple components.
